com.almasb.fxgl.scene

Class FXGLMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.almasb.fxgl.scene.FXGLScene
      • com.almasb.fxgl.scene.FXGLMenu
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CCTRMenu, FXGLDefaultMenu, GTAVMenu

    public abstract class FXGLMenu
extends FXGLScene
    This is a base class for main/game menus. It provides several convenience methods for those who just want to extend an existing menu. It also allows for implementors to build menus from scratch. Freshly build menus can interact with FXGL by calling fire* methods. Both main and game menus should have the following items:
    • Background
    • Title
    • Version
    • Profile name
    • Menu Body
    • Menu Content
    However, in reality a menu can contain anything.
    Author:
    Almas Baimagambetov (AlmasB) (almaslvl@gmail.com)

      • setListener

        public void setListener(MenuEventListener listener)
        Set main listener for menu events.
        Parameters:
        listener - menu listener

      • fireNewGame

        protected final void fireNewGame()
        Fires MenuEvent.NEW_GAME event. Can only be fired from main menu. Starts new game.

      • fireContinue

        protected final void fireContinue()
        Fires MenuEvent.CONTINUE event. Lads the game state from last modified save file.

      • fireLoad

        protected final void fireLoad(SaveFile fileName)
        Fires MenuDataEvent.LOAD event. Loads the game state from previously saved file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the saved file

      • fireSave

        protected final void fireSave()
        Fires MenuEvent.SAVE event. Can only be fired from game menu. Saves current state of the game with given file name.

      • fireDelete

        protected final void fireDelete(SaveFile fileName)
        Fires MenuDataEvent.DELETE event.
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the save file

      • fireResume

        protected final void fireResume()
        Fires MenuEvent.RESUME event. Can only be fired from game menu. Will close the menu and unpause the game.

      • fireLogout

        protected final void fireLogout()
        Fires MenuEvent.LOGOUT event. Can only be fired from main menu. Logs out the user profile.

      • fireMultiplayer

        protected final void fireMultiplayer()
        Call multiplayer access in main menu. Currently not supported.

      • fireExit

        protected final void fireExit()
        Fire MenuEvent.EXIT event. App will clean up the world/the scene and exit.

      • fireExitToMainMenu

        protected final void fireExitToMainMenu()
        Fire MenuEvent.EXIT_TO_MAIN_MENU event. App will clean up the world/the scene and enter main menu.
